This research was made possible through partnerships between the **Canadian Forest Service** and the **US Department of Agriculture Forest Service Research & Development**, fostered by the **Canada-US Forest Health Initiative "One Continent; One Forest; One Threat"** and the **Sustainable Forestry Initiative**, and supported financially by the **US Endowment for Forestry and Communities**.
